content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 27.10.2023 09:32
(to je oni stric, ki so ga ne tako dolgo nazaj prakticno odnesli s
partijskega kongresa... najprej sem sel gledat, a je padel skoz
okno)

it's all xi now...

- Deng Xiaoping's legacy lives on, but his family is effectively
powerless
- Jiang Zemin's influence died with him
- Hu Jintao never really had influence (comparatively)
- Li Keqiang was the only remaining Xi non-loyalist leader post
2017
